name: Bouncing Egg – Play The Eggz On Up it - Circle Pong Rescue Game
name_original: Bouncing Egg – Play The Eggz On Up it - Circle Pong Rescue Game
description:
Bouncing Egg – Circle Pong Game
------------------------------------------------
A modern touch to the classical game to compete revolutionizing game world.

The game is simple you need to keep the egg in the circle by changing the direction of the bar rotating along circumference of the circle by a simple tap

Beat the highest score of yours and challenge your friends

Download now Bouncing Egg – Circle Pong Game for free.
